mapper.select: select * from pj_user where user_id =#{user_id} and password =#{password} and user_grade not in (0)
mapper.update: update pj_user set nickname=#{nickname}, password=#{password}, user_name=#{user_name}, phone=#{phone}, zip_no=#{zip_no}, addr=#{addr} where user_id = #{user_id}
update pj_user set user_grade = 0 where user_id = #{user_id}
update pj_user set user_grade = -1 where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT l.product_id,l.user_id, l.like_time,l.pd_name,p.pd_img,p.pd_price,p.pd_discount,p.pd_status from pj_like l,pj_product p where l.product_id=p.product_id and l.user_id=#{user_id} group by l.product_id,l.user_id,l.like_time,l.pd_name,p.pd_img,p.pd_price,p.pd_discount,p.pd_status order by l.like_time desc

select DISTINCT p.product_id,p.pd_status,p.pd_name, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_img,t.trade_time, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date from pj_trade t,pj_product p where t.product_id=p.product_id and (t.sell_user_id=#{user_id} or t.buyer_user_id=#{user_id}) group by p.product_id,p.pd_status,p.pd_name,t.trade_time, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_img, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date order by t.trade_time desc

select DISTINCT b.product_id,b.user_id, b.board_title,b.board_write_time,p.product_id, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date,p.category_id,p.pd_name, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_status,p.pd_img from pj_board b,pj_product p where b.product_id=p.product_id and user_id=#{user_id} and board_status=1 group by b.product_id,b.user_id,b.board_title, b.board_write_time,p.product_id, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date,p.category_id,p.pd_name, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_status,p.pd_img order by board_write_time desc

select DISTINCT p.pd_name,p.pd_img,u.user_id, p.product_id,c.comment_content,c.comment_write_time, c.comment_no_level,c.group_no,u.nickname from pj_product p,pj_comment c,pj_user u where c.user_id=u.user_id and c.product_id=p.product_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} group by p.pd_name,p.pd_img,u.user_id, p.product_id,c.comment_content,c.comment_write_time, c.comment_no_level,c.group_no,u.nickname order by c.comment_write_time desc
select * from pj_Report where user_id=#{user_id} order by re_time desc
select count(*) from pj_user where user_id=#{user_id} and password=#{password}
